DTM Race Game

boardgame.description: This racing game is packaged in a long, plastic tube. Included in the game are huge maps on large poster-sized sheets, a collection of miniature touring cars (complete with spoilers, hood ornaments, roll-bars and lots of other details), and dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The cars are lined up and the race begins. Going in order from first to last, players have a choice of rolling one, two, or three dice. The first die is a special die with only 1's, 2's and 3's on it, but the other two are normal d6. The dice may be flipped to the opposite face. Before moving the car, the player must commit to the order that the dice will be used. The dice are then used to move your car. However, if you use a die for movement in a corner that's not rated for that speed, you'll get a driving error. Depending on the severity, you might have to journey through pit row on the next lap. Dice showing 2,3,5 allow the car to move diagonally, or else the car must maintain its lane. There is a drafting mechanism that entails following into specially marked spaces. All of this would make the game fairly computational and boring, until you time the players' turns and make the rule, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A die laid is a die played..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The original game came with the DTM Hockenheimring track and there are two subsequent maps to find or purchase, which includes the latest track released at Essen 2000._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; N_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rburgring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Oschersleben_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. This is the 2000 edition. It comes in a plastic tube that screws open and shut. It includes the DTM Hockenheimring, Nurburgring and Oschersleben tracks. When I took out the components to inpect them, this is the first time that the components have been out of the tube. The game has never been played. When I received the game from Germany, the tube had a section that was taped and they had a big sticker on the game with my name and address. I partially removed this. The tube is still in great shape to store the game, but you could also get a tube to store it in if you did not like the remains of a sticker. Comes from a smoke-free home.
for Christian Frank (dschises) only

Mint; opened (to inventory) but never played...this comes with ten (10) cars (by Schuco)(each car in its own plastic display case)! Tracks (3) come in a plastic storage tube, but i_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include the plastic container (for free) that holds the cars/flags/dice/rules/etc. (safer that way)...s/h will be $17.99...

Shipping is €12.90 for Europe, the Mediterranean area and the US, it is €21.50 to all other countries. Feel free to contact me if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re unsure about whether your country is included. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also open to possible suggestions for cheaper shipping, or pick-up. Prices listed are the ones found at: http://www.bpost.be/site/nl/residential/parcels/international/kilopoststand.html#ptarifs

Das Motorsportspiel DTM Hockenheimring Publisher: professional motor sport games (1995) Language: German Condition: played once or twice but in very good condition. The rear spoiler of the black Opel Calibra V6 (model car Herpa 036535) has come off. Someone with a hand more steady than mine can probably glue it back on easily but I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to try. Apart from that the game is complete with no damages and no wear and tear.

Very lightly used set of this race game. This set includes the three courses, Nurburgring, Oschersleben, and Hockenheimring. This set has 18 formula one, open wheel style cars in six colors - red, blue, white, black, yellow and green (three of each color). Comes in the original plastic tube and game components and rules. Buyer to pay priority mail shipping and paypal fee if that payment option is used.
Open and complete, but never played. This version contains 6 cars and 3 separate tracks.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure which version this is. It has 6 Schuco cars in individual boxes and 3 giant glossy maps in like new condition. All other parts (dice, flags and race records) are also in there and like new. This game is in a large tube, so I will have to find a shipping tube and determine shipping cost. Please let me know and I will figure this out before we finish the transaction. Ships from Southern OH - zip code 45011. Thanks for looking!

Auctioned item - For user GALEGO ONLY. ---- German language, with a printout of English rules. Components are language independent, except maybe for the word _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ziel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Goal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, but in this case a better translation is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Finish Line._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a clear plastic screw-together tube with six Schuco cars and three different race courses: Nurburgring, Oschersleben, and Hockenheimring. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been played, but is in excellent condition.

New - out of print game! 6x DTM race cars included! I could offer in addition many cars in seize 1:87 for usage with this game. Especially, in Europe hard to find, NASCAR 1:87 miniatures from Winner Circle. Feel free to ask! Of course you can ask for 1:87 racing cars only, if you like! Please send a mail to my BGG account! Will Ship Worldwide! Postage Costs for Board Games and Miniatures depending on the weight of the item. Please ask for international shipment by sending your postal code, thanks. Within Germany I will use standard DHL parcel including tracking option. Of course you could choose to pick-up the goods without any additional costs. Thanks for viewing my listing, be sure to look at my other items and save on combined postage! A look inside my trade list could be helpful too because I always prefer trades before selling items.

Never used, but game did not come sealed. The boxes for the cars are still sealed. Professional Motor Sports Spiele edition, with Schuco cars, but somehow, this came with printed English rules, and a spare copy of the Oschersleben map. (So, it has 4 maps, two of which are identical, the others are the Nurburgring and Hockenheim.) Comes in two long tubes. Shipping will be a bit of a chore. Please contact me first, and based on zip code, we can come up with something.
Reserved for fury00

In shrinkwrap. Perfect. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. I have many hundreds of games for sale and would be happy to combine shipping charges for multiple games to save you money. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

Comes with two maps and all parts - including the six original Herpa miniatures. Maps are suffering from having been rolled up for 20 years or so. The orange Herpa miniature has a detached spoiler, which could be reattached (haven’t done it myself as I’m rubbish with the glue gun!) I remember this game as being great fun to play...but would advise getting more robust miniatures as the thirty second time limit to move frequently prompts less than gentle handling! Will ship to Europe at cost of your chosen service. If local, cash on collection or delivery is an option. Note...cash on delivery is not an opportunity to offer a lower price! If you are concerned about the condition of any particular item just ask and I will send a clear photo.
The tube was slightly crushed, causing some slight warping. The maps lay flat. One car’s spoiler is broken. Reserved for thejadeape
Base game and 5 total tracks. 2 copies each of Nürburgring _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Oschersleben tracks in Like New condition. 1 copy of base track. Cars not included, any small car or models can be used.
